
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DHAVE_READLINE)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(sqlite3sh
	../alter.c
	../analyze.c
	../attach.c
	../auth.c
	../btree.c
	../build.c
	../callback.c
	../complete.c
	../date.c
	../delete.c
	../expr.c
	../func.c
	../hash.c
	../insert.c
	../legacy.c
	../main.c
	../opcodes.c
	../os.c
	../os_unix.c
	../os_win.c
	../pager.c
	../parse.c
	../pragma.c
	../prepare.c
	../printf.c
	../random.c
	../select.c
	../table.c
	../tokenize.c
	../trigger.c
	../update.c
	../utf.c
	../util.c
	../vacuum.c
	../vdbe.c
	../vdbeapi.c
	../vdbeaux.c
	../vdbefifo.c
	../vdbemem.c
	../where.c
	../shell.c
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(sqlite3sh 
	pthread
	readline
	tcmalloc
)
